extendedInfo.description: Hard day at work? So why not listen to the sound of sea waves, Rain and  forest. Train your concentration and relax listening to the natural sound. Choose a time and not think about anything until the sound ends. Should gradually increase the time to increase the concentration. Close your eyes, put on a headphone , touch this application.When you enter the application can choose the minutes you want to hear the natural sound.â Great quality of the sound â Concentrationâ Absolutely Relaxing!â The best naturally relaxing sound!â Truly miraculous relaxation that will keep you feeling rejuvenated once more.â Absolute pure relaxation from authentic sounds, not artificial but real sounds.THE BENEFITS OF RELAXATION:â Relax state of mind is considered to be the most part of mental healthiness and well being. Relaxation is a natural treatment to stress, known as a factor to the development of disease.â Relaxation will slower your heart rateâ It will lower your blood pressureâ Reduce rate of breathing therefore requiring less oxygenâ Sleep better at nightâ Promote immunity, less illnessâ Increased concentration skillâ Less muscle tension or migrainePeople of whatever region that is a passenger of(bus, train, subway, airplane or car) which enjoys free application for entertainment are invited to download this application. People who attend such events (football, soccer, basketball, baseball, volleyball, tennis, auto-mobility, billiards, poker, movies, world cup, olympics) who like to entertain the application are invited to download this application. This application has no sex, no pictures of women fri, no pictures of hot women, or any material harmful to minors. All persons are invited to help promote this application for (friends, colleagues, mother, father, grandmother, grandfather, brother, sister). For those who want to help indicate this application follows some examples of media (email, SMS, Twitter, Facebook, MSN, YouTube, radio, TV, newspaper, book, magazine, Internet).

reviews.title: Amazing!!!!
reviews.comment: This is beyond relaxing! Thank u sooo much for making it, my sleep has improved & its the best way to stay calm :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I love it.perfect.nice way to stay close to mother nature.
reviews.author: namrata kohli

reviews.title: amazing and so relaxing
reviews.comment: I lived this app....it so soothing  and so relaxing....I love that it can play all day!!!
reviews.author: Amarilis Dominguez

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: Love how relaxing and soothing this is.
reviews.author: Kathy M

reviews.title: Omg
reviews.comment: I use this every night to get me to sleep I am listening to it now! Great for long journeys you need to get this app how did I live without it ? Xxxxxxx <3 <3 <3
reviews.author: Jess Eatough

reviews.title: It\'s alright
reviews.comment: It would be much better if it were a continuous sounds instead of the restart pause it has that throws the relaxation off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good but could b better
reviews.comment: I love relaxing sounds but it doesn\'t last long I put it say 30 minutes and it plays maybe 5 or 10 minutes please tell me why
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Obvious breaks
reviews.comment: If it faded out the end of the track while starring the beginning of the track, that would avoid the breaks. Otherwise, an excellent, simple and usable interface
reviews.author: Chris Watkins

reviews.title: Awesome app
reviews.comment: When the times you are tossing n turning at night trying to fall asleep this app works wonders to listen to nature sounds to help relax you. It has me sleeping like a baby when needed. Thanks dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: Great idea, just needs one more thing, loop breaks to not be noticeable. Amazing app, does wonders for sleeplessness, thanks dev.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: mmsjking
reviews.comment: Every track is so relaxing. I just clear my mind and listen, calms and soothes me right away! Keep up the GOOD work!!!!! Thank you
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Relaxing
reviews.comment: I chose my favourite sound and pipe it through my 18 watt Bluetooth speaker, whenever I want to fill my room with sound. Very soothing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No complaints
reviews.comment: Just installed it, along with others. Keep going back and forth playing all. Deciding which to keep, which to uninstall. So far, this one is a KEEPER. Almost falling asleep while multi-tasking.  :-)  Yea.....A KEEPER !! Thanks
reviews.author: donna lane

reviews.title: Great, relaxing, lite app
reviews.comment: Great, relaxing app. Whilst there aren\'t many sounds, this allows the app to be lighter than others.  A few sounds are very similar and could get traded for something more different. And perhaps reduce the gap at the end of each rotation. But generally a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: SUCKS! VERY DISAPPOINTED
reviews.comment: I thought it was gonna b good, til i listened to it for about 3 min. Then the loop came & it just stops for bout 2 seconds then starts back up again. OMG!!! U should never hear the loop!! It shouldnt b obvious at all that there even is a loop!!! Uninstallin right now!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Loops too short
reviews.comment: Sound quality is very realistic.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too much water noise
reviews.comment: I agree with another reviewer; some of the tracks make you need to use the loo!
reviews.author: Susie Risser

reviews.title: Pretty Nice App.
reviews.comment: It\'s nice and relaxing. I like that you can set how long you want to listen to it. I gave 4* instead of 5* due to the fact the last 3 of 5 yracks sound to close to the same thing. Should have something like thunder, rain, or meditation music. Pretty nice though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very relaxing
reviews.comment: I recommend this app for stress and trouble sleeping its amazing I love it after a hard day of work it puts me right to sleep
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: This has helps me fall asleep but it would be nice if there where names instead of numbers to choose from
reviews.author: A Google User
